about.description: Self-driven full-stack,Java developer with a passion for thoughtful system designs, implemenation, and mentoring.
about.bio: I am an Indian based Full Stack Developer with 8+ years of experience in design and development of highly scalable applications using Java and JavaScript technologies.Worked with tech giants including Fortune 500 companies like JP Morgan,Target Corporation, GE etc.

certifications.title: Certified Scrum Master
certifications.description: Certified Scrum Master (CSM) is one of the top most certificates in the IT industry. It’s a certificate awarded to the team coaches based on their understanding of the Scrum framework.
